mapper.insert: INSERT INTO the_circulation ( state, circulation, ctime, username,parentnodeId,city,rolename ) VALUES ( #{state},#{circulation},#{ctime},#{username},#{ParentnodeId},#{city},#{rolename})
INSERT INTO the_circulation ( state, circulation, ctime, username,parentnodeId,city,rolename ) VALUES ( #{state},#{circulation},#{ctime},#{username},#{ParentnodeId},#{city},#{rolename})
mapper.select: SELECT circulation,ctime,city,rolename FROM the_circulation where city=#{city} and parentnodeId= #{ParentnodeId} and username= #{username}
